document_data.name: Faeryl Melarn
document_data.mainbody: '''Faeryl Melarn''' was a senior [[drow]] priestess of [[House Melarn (Menzoberranzan)|House Melarn]] in [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.Personality: Faeryl was willing to risk accusation of heresy and treason in her effort to stop the [[Demon Weave]].
document_data.History: Faeryl in [[1479 DR]] agreed to meet [[Valan Jaelre]] of the [[Jaezred Chaulssin]] in the [[Braeryn]] in order to have help to stop the Demon Weave.
document_data.Relationship: Faeryl was a relative of matron mother [[Zhindia Melarn]]
